languageKey.label: Mailjet
Subscription form configuration
Confirmation email customization
Messages and errors
Create and edit a form to let users subscribe to a specific Mailjet list.
Title
Mailjet contact list - Select a contact list where all new subscribers will be added. You can create additional contact lists in your Mailjet account.
Contact properties - Select up to 3 contact properties to be shown in your subscription form.
Label for the first contact property in the form
Label for the second contact property in the form
Label for the third contact property in the form
Description for the first contact property in the form
Description for the second contact property in the form
Description for the third contact property in the form
example@domain.com
Form description
Submit Button label
Email Heading text
Email Body text
Email Confirmation Button text - This is the text of the button inside the subscription confirmation email.
Email Footer text
Thanks,
Owner - Site owner name, shown at the end of the subscription confirmation email.

Confirmation Message - Default: Subscription confirmation email sent to %email. Please check your inbox and confirm the subscription. (Note: The '%email' symbol will be replaced by the email address of the subscriber)

Data type mismatch - Default: Please enter the correct values according to the example of the description in the field: %id. (Note: The %id symbol will be replaced by the name of field and the %type symbol will be replaced by the type of data required by the field)
Subscribe error. Please try again later! - This message will appear in case an error occurs during subscription form submission.

The contact %email is already subscribed - This message will appear when the subscriber already exists in your Mailjet contact list. (Note: The %email symbol will be replaced by the email address of the subscriber)
Thanks for subscribing - This message will appear when the subscriber is successfully added to the contact list.
Email field label

* Email FROM address - this is a required field! This is the email address used to send the confirmation email to the subscriber! Use one of your validated sender email addresses from your Mailjet account. If the field is empty the subscriber will not receive the confirmation email and will not be able to subscribe!
